titleStmt.title: Winter-evening conference between neighbours. Part III
titleStmt.author: Goodman, John, 1625 or 6-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Goodman by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Sequel to: Winter-evening conference between neighbours : in two parts. London: Printed by J.M. for R. Royston, 1684.
Also appears as part of Wing G1132 at reel 917:8.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
